V. Thambawita

P. Jakobsen
H. L. Hammer

M. A. Riegler
dcterms:description: The Home-Tasks Activities Database (HTAD) consists of wrist-accelerometer and audio data from individuals conducting 7 home activities including: mopping floor, sweeping floor, typing on computer keyboard, eating chips, brushing teeth, washing hands, and watching television. The database includes accelerometer and sound features.
dcterms:title: HTAD Dataset

dcterms:creator: F. Ofli
R. Chaudhry
G. Kurillo
R. Vidal
R. Bajcsy
dcterms:description: The Berkeley MHAD dataset was recorded using data from accelerometers, an optical motion capture system, microphones, depth sensors, and stereo cameras. The data was recorded by 12 individuals performing 11 actions.
dcterms:title: Berkeley MHAD Dataset
